page.title: 03PORTWAY JUNIOR SCHOOL CONT
page.content: steam-roller remains now and that is soon to be sold. Now in l985 our old mathematics scheme, Fletcher, was replaced by the new Nuffield mathematic scheme. The library was built in l97l and opened with 3,500 books including maths. books etc. Mrs. Copping and Miss Entwisle took over in l973 and now in the library there are four thousand books. There used to be a lot ofsmokers at one time,but now in l985 there is only one smoker. There is usually a summer fete every two years, but in l984 the teachers were on strike so we missed out. In l962, 23rd May the swimming pool was opened, paid for by school funds. The pool was officially opened a week later by the County Education Officer. The comment was "cold". In l982 a cove
